version_description: general bug fixes and optimization

- General bugfixes and optimizations
- iOS 9 compatibility
The completely redesigned user interface is easy to navigate and makes managing your pharmacy benefit and your health simple.

The completely redesigned user interface is easy to navigate and makes managing your pharmacy benefit and your health simple.

•Household access – Members with family plans can now seamlessly manage access across their family members.
•Multi-family member checkout – Order refills for everyone in your family in a single transaction.
•Hassle-Free Fill – Set up and manage medications for automatic refill.

The completely redesigned user interface is easy to navigate and makes managing your pharmacy benefit and your health simple.

• Members now can initiate a Prior Authorization request from the app
• “Best Price” displayed first from Drug Pricing Results
• Home screen improvements to make the app easier to navigate
• Ability to add Member IDs to Apple Wallet
• Bug fixes
The completely redesigned user interface is easy to navigate and makes managing your pharmacy benefit and your health simple.

•Touch ID improvements
•Ability to pay outstanding balance due
•Improvements to checkout flow
•Drug pricing tools enhancements
•Addition of in app feedback survey
•Bug fixes
The completely redesigned user interface is easy to navigate and makes managing your pharmacy benefit and your health simple.

• Members now can initiate a Prior Authorization request from the app
• “Best Price” displayed first from Drug Pricing Results
• Home screen improvements to make the app easier to navigate
• Ability to add Member IDs to Apple Wallet
• Bug fixes

Members can archive medications they do not wish to view
Members can request a call from a customer service representative
The app will first display "Best Price" for "Lower Cost Alternative" medications
We have simplified and quickened checkout
We added a visual tracker for Prior Authorization
Bug fixes

• Shipping and tracking information from certain carriers
• Updated cost information at checkout
• Bug fixes

•Members will be able to request a medication without a prescription. After they make the request, OptumRx will work with their doctor to get a prescription.
•Members can request prescriptions from the prior authorization status screen.
•Bug fixes

•Members will be able to request a medication without a prescription. After they make the request, OptumRx will work with their doctor to get a prescription.
•Members can request prescriptions from the prior authorization status screen.
•Bug fixes

*We have simplified refill and renew reminders. Members only have to opt-in, instead of entering drug information or reminder dates.
*Members can check the status of orders with the new virtual assistant. This is an option that will be available instead of customer service, though members can switch to customer service if they have more questions.
*Members can add a credit card to their account with a smartphone camera.
*Members can view and update expired credit cards on the app.
*Bug fixes

•Members now have additional Pharmacy Search parameters
•We have improved the usability of the app for our members with disabilities
•Included a fix to help members who were unable to add payment methods
•Other Bug fixes
We included some minor bug fixes
minor bug fixes

• We have enhanced our verbiage for Automatic Refills to make the service more clear to members
• Fixed an issue where some users were unable to login with Touch and Face ID
• We included some minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes and usability improvements.

•We enhanced our checkout process to indicate which items are being added to the cart and to improve the price transparency of medications

•We heard your feedback and have redesigned our homepage with a simpler design and large buttons to order, price and track medications.
